channel.title: Seraph Online Fiesta Private Server ("Underproduction")
channel.description:
Seraph Online Open Beta(Coming soon to Moparscape)
Join the Forums Now! [URL=http://"http://seraph.zxproductions.net/index.php"]Seraph Online Forums[/URL]
Seraph Online What is it? Well its a Private Server based of a Online game Called Fiesta. It was a big hit back in 2006 with over 400k players always on but now its gone back down to 100k players which is pretty amazing either way. Now We started with the databases back in 2005 so it was very under developed but now we have around 2009 fiesta files after many hours coding Hope you Enjoy what we have here for you. I have also been working on this for several months! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Things that Are done And Need to be done
- Fixing Create Character Glitch - Make Level 100 Job Change a quest - Finish All the Shops - Add More CosPlay Costums - Create a Sad Dramatic Quest - Fix Combat For all Classes - Fix Job change Dungeon 1 and 2 - Fix Broken Quests - Fix Japanese Names to American On Items - Fix The trading System - Fix Character Eco System ("Player Stores, and trading") - Newest Character Models - Fixed Chat System - Increase Exp Setting for all 800 npcs - Improved Sound and Area Music - Create Account.php (need help on this pl0x dont understand odbc Connections) - New Maps and Mobs for each location - Guilds and Clans Databases (Now Working) - Items Need level requirments - Master Bosses - Better Mining, Gathering, and Crafting - Advanced Clan war system - Kingdom Quests - Working Following - Enchanting Enchanced - All Skills for all classes - Make Over Shop ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Now Instalation Process N/A Yet ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Pictures [IMG]http://puu.sh/AASe[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/AAQS[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/yEqj[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/yiic[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o0dYU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MQSYK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/z7X2z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jEncB.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/F1Qx[/img]

item.title: Seraph Online Fiesta Private Server ("Underproduction")

@xzorniax wrote:

Nice. Wish there saw a swg private server, That didnt require disk.

item.title: Seraph Online Fiesta Private Server ("Underproduction")
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Chase1 Sir_Chase
item.description:
@Sir_Chase1 wrote:

Seraph Online Open Beta(Coming soon to Moparscape)

Join the Forums Now! Seraph Online Forums

Seraph Online What is it? Well its a Private Server based of a Online game Called Fiesta. It was a big hit back in 2006 with over 400k players always on but now its gone back down to 100k players which is pretty amazing either way. Now We started with the databases back in 2005 so it was very under developed but now we have around 2009 fiesta files after many hours coding Hope you Enjoy what we have here for you. I have also been working on this for several months!

Things that Are done And Need to be done

  • Fixing Create Character Glitch
  • Make Level 100 Job Change a quest
  • Finish All the Shops
  • Add More CosPlay Costums
  • Create a Sad Dramatic Quest
  • Fix Combat For all Classes
  • Fix Job change Dungeon 1 and 2
  • Fix Broken Quests
  • Fix Japanese Names to American On Items
  • Fix The trading System
  • Fix Character Eco System (“Player Stores, and trading”)
  • Newest Character Models
  • Fixed Chat System
  • Increase Exp Setting for all 800 npcs
  • Improved Sound and Area Music
  • Create Account.php (need help on this pl0x dont understand odbc Connections)
  • New Maps and Mobs for each location
  • Guilds and Clans Databases (Now Working)
  • Items Need level requirments
  • Master Bosses
  • Better Mining, Gathering, and Crafting
  • Advanced Clan war system
  • Kingdom Quests
  • Working Following
  • Enchanting Enchanced
  • All Skills for all classes
  • Make Over Shop

Now Instalation Process
N/A Yet
